sources.title: Alishomali Yahoo Azar
sources.description: Azar Director: Mohammad Hamzei Writer: Ehsan Biglari Stars: Niki Karimi, Shirin Aghakashi, Hamid Reza Azarang, Pejman Jamshidi Synopsis A woman whose husband in jail is trying hardly to manage the cafe restaurant she has opened with her husband. She also tries to compromise to get her husband released but things are not going as she is planning to.
